attributes.action: Give compensation to the 2100 seafarers sacked by P&O in 1988
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 2100 seafarers were sacked by P&O European Ferries(Dover) in 1988 during a legal industrial dispute.Terms and conditions were changed resulting in more hours worked for less pay.P&O refused to negotiate, or use ACAS to its full potential, to bring the dispute to a satisfactory conclusion.The workforce were basically told to accept the new terms or be sacked.2100 seafarers were sacked,and have not received any compensation despite the ILO ruling that they were sacked illegally.Please give justice to the sacked seafarers.
